name: .JPG_SMALL File Extension
summary: Learn about .JPG_SMALL files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a JPG_SMALL file with any image viewer or web browser that supports JPEG images, such as Google Chrome (multiplatform) or Adobe Photoshop (multiplatform). However, some applications that support JPEG images may not recognize the .jpg_small file extension and not open the image. If this is the case, rename the file extension to .jpg then open it as a .JPG file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
